summary: A memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York dated August 12, 2019, reporting information passed from a Special Housing Unit member regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein. It notes that on August 9, 2019, there was information that Epstein would need a cellmate upon arrival from an attorney visit, and that another inmate was going to the hospital and might not return.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate referenced in the memorandum, identified by his inmate number #76318-054, for whom information was passed that he would need a cellmate upon arrival from an attorney visit.

events.title: Information Passed Regarding Epstein's Cellmate Need
events.description: At approximately 1:50 p.m., information was passed from a Special Housing Unit member that inmate Jeffrey Epstein would need a cellmate upon arrival from his attorney visit.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
keyFacts: The document is a government memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York dated August 12, 2019.
It reports information passed on August 9, 2019, that inmate Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) would need a cellmate upon arrival from an attorney visit.
It also notes that another inmate was going to the hospital and might not return, though that inmate is not named.
The document originates from the period just before Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
